title: U.S. household expenditure on hair care products 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, gradually increasing from 2013 to 2016, and finally slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, about 89.95 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 61.69 was reported at Year 2012
